system.requirements: Basic Slaanesh Ritual to summon a Daemonette. Requires Site of great Debauchery or excess. Summoning Circle marked by Slaaneshi Symbols with Braziers of Hallucinogenic incense and intoxicating elixirs are spread around the ritual site. Six Adult Humans are made delirious through narcotics, slashed with anointed knives, marked with daemonic runes, then murdered.
system.effect:
A Daemonette is summoned, it remains corporeal for 1d5+5 rounds, +1 Round per Degree of Success on Ritual Test. If the veil between reality is thin, or the daemon is further empowered through slaughter it may stay for longer.  If the Daemon is summoned for a specific task, it remains long enough to complete it (within reason).
A Daemonic Mastery Test may be made to take control of the Daemon.
system.costs: The Ritual Triggers Psychic Phenomena, all participants also must make a +0 Willpower Test or become stunned in joy and agony. This may prevent Daemonic Mastery Tests occuring.
system.failure: Contempt of the Warp Occurs, with +10 to the roll per Degree of Failiure on Ritual Test beyond the first.
